name: tryst
short_description:
Python program designed to keep track of long playlists of media files, playing one at a time or playing all until stopped, in either case keeping track of current position.

Designed and primarily intended for my personal use only, so performance is not guaranteed, and in general don't expect much in the way of support. You can email me, and maybe I'll answer.

After downloading, extract the archive and view the readme file.
summary: Create, save, and iterate through playlists.
